org.nd4j.linalg.api.parallel.tasks.cpu.indexaccum

Class CPUIndexAccumulations1dAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask<java.lang.Void>
      • java.util.concurrent.RecursiveAction
        • org.nd4j.linalg.api.parallel.tasks.cpu.indexaccum.CPUIndexAccumulations1dAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Void>, Task<java.lang.Void>

    public class CPUIndexAccumulations1dAction
extends java.util.concurrent.RecursiveAction
implements Task<java.lang.Void>
    A class used specifically for IndexAccumulation along dimensions for 1d. It differs from other IndexAccumulation tasks in that it assigns the output directly instead of returning, plus does multiple index accumulation ops in the one object (helps to avoid object creation cost for large number of small ops)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
